issue.title: [R] readr short type mapping has T and t backwards
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13624](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13624). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-6537 added the mapping of single-character column types from readr to Arrow types, but it seems that T got mapped to time32() instead of timestamp(); likewise t got mapped wrong.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13624?focusedCommentId=17424957) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11327
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11327>
